prompts: Create a cute ice-type Pokemon with a fluffy body and frosty blue spikes.
Show me a tiny Pokemon that resembles a snowball with icy features and a playful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that blends into snowy environments, showcasing soft white colors and a round shape.
Generate a Pokemon inspired by winter landscapes, featuring crystalline structures and a gentle personality.

Give me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of winter, with cool colors and a cute, cuddly shape.
